body_html:
The fact that you need to use a USB swap drive makes me think it may not make sense to add those instructions here.. but would be helpful to somehow highlight the way in which some people have shoehorned bazel onto the RPi...

I am asking some questions on those instructions before I would want to write up the steps from there..

My gut is, the script we are leveraging in the official instructions of TF just needs to be updated / verified to work

body:
The fact that you need to use a USB swap drive makes me think it may not make sense to add those instructions here..  but would be helpful to somehow highlight the way in which some people have shoehorned bazel onto the RPi...

I am asking some questions on those instructions before I would want to write up the steps from there..

My gut is, the script we are leveraging in the official instructions of TF just needs to be updated / verified to work
